extension.name: FavPromote
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
FavPromote is a free responsive Joomla! module that lets you upload any image and assign it a short description and a title with a Font Awesome icon.
For more info, please see the demo and documentation for the FavPromote module.



Copyright © 2012-2015 FavThemes.

field.name: jquery_load
field.label: Load Joomla! jQuery
field.description: Load Joomla! jQuery library. Choose 'No' if your instance loads jQuery from an eternal source.

field.name: layout_effect
field.label: Layout Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the layout on scroll.

field.name: title_google_font
field.label: Title Google Font
field.description: Copy the Google Web Font name here, for example Open Sans or Lato.

field.name: title_padding
field.label: Title Padding
field.description: Set the padding for the title of the module. The padding shorthand property sets all the padding properties in one declaration for top, right, bottom and left padding. This property can have from one to four values. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: title_font_size
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the title of the module. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: title_line_height
field.label: Title Line Height
field.description: Set the line height for the title of the module.

field.name: title_text_align
field.label: Title Text Align
field.description: Set the text alignment for the title of the module.

field.name: title_icon_font_size
field.label: Title Icon Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon of the title. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: title_icon_vertical_align
field.label: Title Icon Vertical Align
field.description: Set the vertical alignment for the icon of the title of the module.

field.name: description_text_font_size
field.label: Description Font Size
field.description: Choose the font-size for the description text. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: description_text_line_height
field.label: Description Line Height
field.description: Choose the line-height for the description text. The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between lines of text. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: description_text_align
field.label: Description Text Align
field.description: Set the text alignment for the description of the module.

field.name: show_column1
field.label: Show Column 1
field.description: Choose if this module column and its title should be displayed or not.

field.name: column_border_color1
field.label: Column 1 Border Color
field.description: Choose the color for the border of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: column_border_radius1
field.label: Column 1 Border Radius
field.description: Choose the border-radius for the border of the module column. Note that this option does not work in IE7-8 due to lack of border-radius support. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: upload_image1
field.label: Upload Image 1
field.description: Upload the image for the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_image_link1
field.label: Image 1 Show Link
field.description: Choose if the image link should be displayed or not.

field.name: image_link1
field.label: Image 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the module column image.

field.name: image_target1
field.label: Image 1 Link Target
field.description: Select the link target of the URL for the module column image.

field.name: image_alt1
field.label: Image 1 Alt Text
field.description: Insert text for the image Alt. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_text1
field.label: Title 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the title of the module.

field.name: title_color1
field.label: Title 1 Color
field.description: Choose the color for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_bg_color1
field.label: Title 1 Background Color
field.description: Choose the color for the background of the title of the module. This is also the color for the module background on hover. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_title_link1
field.label: Title 1 Show Link
field.description: Choose if the link for the title of the module should be displayed or not.

field.name: title_link1
field.label: Title 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the title of the module.

field.name: title_target1
field.label: Title 1 Link Target
field.description: Select the target for the URL of the title of the module.

field.name: title_icon1
field.label: Title 1 Icon
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name. For example: fa-camera or fa-arrow. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text1
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor.
field.label: Description 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description of the module column.

field.name: description_text_color1
field.label: Description 1 Text Color
field.description: Choose the color for the description of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.
